title: Anadromous Dialogues #7: Alastair Roberts (Physical Reality, Time, and How to Approach the Bible)
description:
Here is the next in my series of Anadromous Interviews. This time we have a robust discussion with theologian and biblical scholar Alastair Roberts. From England Roberts shares lively ideas about the nature of reality and how to engage with the biblical texts. Give ear!
Also you should visit his channel sometime:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCmkS1-6kt64WIHegj-h25_g
......
Please donate to this channel through PayPal. More than $50 at once or $10 per month will get you ten hours of AUDIO extras from the Anadromist. Click this...    
https://www.paypal.com/donate?hosted_button_id=GE5NHN8AYL3YC
................
The Anadromous Life essay site for more in depth ideas:  https://theanadromist.wordpress.com/ 

Visit my Gravity From Above channel is this one: 
https://www.youtube.com/user/gulagzero 
The Gravity From Above site for more artistic ideas involving puppetry, music, dance and other arts.   
https://gravityfromabove.wordpress.com/ 

And to understand more about my life in Georgia check out my Georgian Crossroads channel: 
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCeFJ6Tm71ieNcjcUb-Trc8g
And if you want to communicate with me use The Anadromous Life Facebook page. 
https://www.facebook.com/theanadromist/ 
(I don't want to have to make my personal page private because I have too many 'friends'. If it's dialogue you want go there. I'll start 'community' page soon enough if the demand is there.) 
Thanks for watching, more coming soon! 

Meanwhile dig into the Anadromous past. 
From Tbilisi Georgia 
(Look it up on a map!) 
Swimming Against the Stream
Byrne

#AlastairRoberts #Christianity #Reality
